lead_paragraph: A second State Supreme Court justice quit Tuesday in a scandal over offensive emails that he and others exchanged with friends and lawyers.

headline.print_headline: Pennsylvania: Second Justice Quits Over Email Scandal
headline.main: Pennsylvania: Second Justice Quits Over Email Scandal

snippet: A second State Supreme Court justice quit Tuesday in a scandal over offensive emails that he and others exchanged with friends and lawyers.
abstract: Pennsylvania Justice Michael Eakin retires amid scandal in connection with hundreds of offensive emails he exchanged with friends and lawyers, many of which have been publicly released by Atty Gen Kathleen Kane since 2014; is second State Supreme Court justice to leave office due to email controversy.
